title: I have a theory on why people in NZ are lagging!
body: As you know wool produces heavy static electricity, what if all the sheep are rubbing against each other when they try and move, simply because theirs a lack of island space for them all, thus causing the static electricity to interfere with the internet. So when they play a game it just lags to hell, all because of the sheep.

replies.body: no 1 cares m8 get a life

No?

Rubbing wool with wool doesn't cause static electricity. You have to rub a neg with a pos, like an ebonite rod and a piece of wool.

MBY ITS BECUZ WATER

The water affects electrical conductivity, if NZ wasn't an island, then the water wouldn't inteferre, amirite.

Yet another racist remark from our favourite scrotum.

Regret level = 0
